name: Universities Superannuation Scheme Ltd
goal:
Universities Superannuation Scheme Ltd is a trustee company solely set up to administer the principal pension scheme provided by UK Universities, Higher Education and other associated institutions for their employees. It runs the pensions administration and group functions from the head office in Liverpool. It is regulated by the Pensions Regulator.

USS Investment Management Ltd is a subsidiary of Universities Superannuation Scheme Ltd, which operates the investment arm of the business from its London office. It is regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority.
interests: Climate Action, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Taxation
